p: Chemicals such as NaCl, chloroform, concentrated sulfuric acid, ferric chloride, lead acetate etc were collected from the general laboratory of the campus. 25 g of AlbuMAX™| Lipid-Rich BSA Cat#11020021(Gibco™ United States) and 5,5′-Dithiobis(2-nitrobenzoic acid) (DTNB; Ellman’s Reagent) Cat# 22582 (Gibco™ United States) were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific. Acetylthoicholine chloride (ATCCl) Cat # A5626 (Sigma Aldrich, St. Louis, United States), Gelatin solution Cat # G1393 (Sigma Aldrich, United States), Acetylcholinesterase (AChE) from Electric eel Cat # C3389 (Sigma Aldrich, United States) were purchased from Sigma.
